description.title: Children 10 and under receive 30% off Stylist’s regular price

description.description: **Service prices do not include taxes or gratuities and are subject to change without notice.

description.title: Extensions
description.description: We offer both bonded and tape-in extensions. Both services require a consultation prior to making the extension appointment.  Price is quoted after consultation.
**Service prices do not include taxes or gratuities and are subject to change without notice.

description.title: Shampoo and conditioner service only
description.description: These services include shampoo, conditioner and scalp massage but do not include blow-dry/style unless booked separately.
**Service prices do not include taxes or gratuities and are subject to change without notice.

description.title: Highlights (Foils/Ombre/Balayage)
description.description: The price on this service varies depending on the amount of hair and the desired effect. Your Colour Designer will quote a price before they begin the work.

description.title: Corrective Colour
description.description: With corrective colour, the goal is to fix the problem and leave the hair in a beautiful, healthy condition. Corrective colour is a process that takes time, and occasionally will require more than one session to reach the desired result. All corrective colour work requires a consultation prior to the appointment date. A price for service will be provided at that time.

description.title: Blonding
description.description: A consultation prior to the appointment date is required. A price for service will be provided at that time.

description.title: Straightening & Smoothing
description.description: Consultation for a price is determined by how much product is required for length of hair and hair type.

name: Products
description: At Rush Salon, we like to use the best products for our customers
